text: When is the Lunar New Year?

children.text: This Lunar New Year was on February 1, 2022. However, the exact day falls on different dates every year as it coincides with the lunar calendar.

text: What animal is this Lunar New Year?

children.text: The year of the Tiger! Every year is a new animal in the Zodiacâ€”mouse, ox, tiger, rabbit, dragon, snake, horse, sheep, monkey, rooster, dog, pig.

text: Where did the Lunar New Year originate?

children.text: Ancient China, as far back as the 14th Century B.C. during the Shang Dynasty! :)
